sense.name: Fix, position, set severely or deeply, attach to
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] EMBED NP2[patient] (IN NP3) NP1[patient[state]] EMBED (itself) IN NP2) NP1[agent[human]] EMBED NP2[company, human] Note: May be concrete or abstract.
sense.examples: The dentist embedded the tooth in his gum. The writer embedded clause after clause, producing a very long sentence. The sentence in question was embedded deep in the third paragraph. The young reporter was embedded with the Third Division.
